SELECT e.elPi_ElectricPileCode, e.ep_num, p.powerStation_name, e.comm_status commStatus, t.arg_value simCode, left(w.arg_value,5) as simOperator, t.create_date createDate, IF(t.update_date='0000-00-00 00:00:00',null,t.update_date) updateDate FROM tbl_electricpile e LEFT JOIN tbl_powerstation p on p.powerStation_id = e.elPi_RelevancePowerStation LEFT JOIN tbl_electricpile_workarg t on t.ep_code = e.elPi_ElectricPileCode and t.arg_id=21 LEFT JOIN tbl_electricpile_workarg w on w.ep_code = e.elPi_ElectricPileCode and w.arg_id=22 where 1=1 and e.delete_flag = 0
and e.elPi_ElectricPileCode LIKE CONCAT('%',#{elpiElectricpilecode},'%' )
and p.powerStation_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{postName},'%' )
